Field Definition: A RealtyTrac integer identifier for the property
A RealtyTrac integer identifier for the foreclosure event
The five-digit state and county Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code combination of the jurisdiction
The type of foreclosure event that this record represents
The mortgagee(s), listed as a concatenated name(s) of the borrower(s) in default
The lender name from the foreclosure activity document, typically the most current beneficiary
The lender's parsed address from the foreclosure event document
The lender parsed city name from the foreclosure event document
The lender parsed state code from the foreclosure event document
The Lender parsed zip code from the foreclosure event document
The lender phone number from the foreclosure event document
The cleaned, formatted version of the lender's name from foreclosure event document
The parent company of the lender
The merged company of the lender
The servicer's entity, populated when available
The servicer's address
The servicer's city name
The servicer's phone number
The servicer's state code
The servicer's zip code
The trustee or attorney handling the foreclosure event
The trustee parsed address
The trustee parsed city name
The trustee parsed state code
The trustee parsed zip code
The trustee phone number
The date which the court clerk officially recorded the foreclosure event document in the county records
The official number assigned at document recording by the clerk of the court to track a document. This is a unique identifier at the document level and unique only within the county
The foreclosure event document book and page
The date when the foreclosure instrument was created
The Mortgage Document Number
The original loan book page number of the foreclosure event document
The recording date of original mortgage document
The public auction date from the foreclosure event document
The opening bid as recorded on the foreclosure event document
An unique identifier established by the court in a judicial foreclosure proceeding. NOTE: this is not a document level identifier, rather it is case level. A case consists of many documents.
The unique number assigned by the trustee to track status of foreclosure and auction proceedings.
The regular monthly payment from related mortgage document
The original loan account number of loan in default
The maturity date of loan in default
The total amount of payments in arrears, or delinquent.
The original amount of loan in default
The amount of penalty interest accrued
The remaining balance on defaulted loan
The interest rate of loan in default
The date of final judgment, if a lis pendens case
The amount of final judgment amount, including fees and interest
The name or description of courthouse hosting the public auction
The location of public auction
The parsed city and state of the public auction
The time the public auction will begin
The date of subject property record creation for this document
The date when the record data was last updated
The date when the record data was included for publication
An indicator for suggested record processing
Automated Valuation Model estimate of value at the time of foreclosure document recording
